title: Bones & Arrows
description:
This was my very first game jam I took part in, and likewise the first game I contributed code to that also got finished. It is a tower defense game in which you defend yourself against a growing army of skeletons while upgrading your defenses after a predefined round time. I mainly worked on:

  • Creating UI and stat visuals
  • Handling different scenes
  • Year: 2018
  • Platform: Windows
  • Engine: Unity
